sourcesContent:
Book

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { BookService } from '../../Services/BookService'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Author } from '../../Models/Author'; import { Book } from '../../Models/Book'; import { AuthorService } from '../../Services/AuthorService'; @Component({ selector: 'app-book-create', templateUrl: './book-create.component.html', styleUrls: ['./book-create.component.css'] }) export class BookCreateComponent { authors!: Author[] book!: Book; constructor(private bookService: BookService, private builder: FormBuilder,private authorService: AuthorService) { } myform: FormGroup = this.builder.group({ id: [''], title: [''], description: [''], authorId: [''] }) ngOnInit() { this.authorService.getAuthors().subscribe(t => { this.authors = t; }); } onSubmit() { console.log("subm"); if (this.myform.get("authorId")?.value != "0") { console.log("created"); this.book = { ...this.book, ...this.myform.value } console.log(this.book); this.bookService.createBook(this.book); } } }
